DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine pharmacokinetics oral Ixabepilone .
DOC.criteria: ECOG status 02 . Unable swallow pill . Current recent GI disease GI surgery . Brain mets . Severe nerve damage . ANC < 1,500/mm3 Platelets < 125K . Bilirubin > =1.5 time IULN . ALT/AST > =1.5 time IULN . Creatine > 1.5 time IULN . Prior treatment Ixabepilone . Strong use CYPP450 drug .
